name: Inter-University Transfer Details
description: UI for displaying university transfer details slip
template:
<% for(var i=0; i < currentFaculty.length; i++) { %> <%= currentFaculty[i][0] %> <%= currentFaculty[i][1] %>
<% }%>
<% for(var i=0; i < proposedFaculty.length; i++) { %> <%= proposedFaculty[i][0] %> <%= proposedFaculty[i][1] %>
<% }%>
<% certificateHistory[0][1].history.forEach(certificate => { %> <% }); %>
Institution From To Certificate Obtained Grade
<%= certificate.institution %> <%= certificate.from %> <%= certificate.to %> <%= certificate.certificateObtained %> <%= certificate.grade %>
